strapiPost.title: Greenhouse Outdoor Recreation Program Launches Largest Cohort Yet
strapiPost.content:
The Greenhouse Outdoor Recreation Program welcomed its largest cohort ever on Aug 29, with with eight startups participating in the U of A's flagship business incubation program.

Greenhouse Growth: The 12-week program provides up to $15,000 in non-dilutive seed funding per company. Since 2022, GORP has launched 17 startups and supported over 200 entrepreneurs through various workshops, services, and workspace at the Collaborative.

Homegrown: Of the eight startups in the fall cohort, five originated in Northwest Arkansas, including startups focussed on outdoor recreation apparel, community apps, outdoor ed services, and one athletic apparel company founded by a local high school student. â€¨

See the full list of startups and their unique ideas HERE.
